mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (email, nickname, profile_image, created_at, updated_at, kakao_user_id, connected_id, refresh_token, birth_date) VALUES (#{email}, #{nickname}, #{profileImage}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{kakaoUserId}, #{connectedId}, #{refreshToken}, #{birthDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET nickname = #{nickname}, profile_image = #{profileImage}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, kakao_user_id = #{kakaoUserId}, connected_id = #{connectedId}, refresh_token = #{refreshToken}, birth_date = #{birthDate} WHERE id = #{id}
